KPA1.guidance: You have prepared Module planning & curriculum design This activity reflects the NWU value Lifelong Learning and supports the KPA Consider uploading a lesson plan as a primary artefact Add a one line note for each file stating what it is and the date and include the module or task name in the filename

KPA2.guidance: Impressive You have prepared OHS compliance check This activity reflects the NWU value Accountability and supports the KPA Consider uploading You have prepared OHS as a primary artefact Add a one line note for each file stating what it is and the date and include the module or task name in the filename

KPA3.guidance: Well done You have prepared Level Up Learning This activity reflects the NWU value Innovation and supports the KPA Consider uploading You have prepared Level as a primary artefact Add a one line note for each file stating what it is and the date and include the module or task name in the filename

KPA4.guidance: You have prepared SDL scientific committee 5 Consider uploading You have prepared SDL as a primary artefact Add a one line note for each file stating what it is and the date and include the module or task name in the filename

KPA5.guidance: You have prepared SASHT website management This activity reflects the NWU value Social Responsiveness and supports the KPA Consider uploading an outreach report or summary as a primary artefact Add a one line note for each file stating what it is and the date and include the module or task name in the filename For external partners check goodwill permission or a memorandum of understanding before sharing
